Taoist monastery/palace gate watchtower/platform
surname Guan
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
Tieguanyin tea (a variety of oolong tea)
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
Guanyin or Kuanyin township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan

sentences.english: Chenrezig is the embodiment of love and compassion.
sentences.chinese: 觀音是愛與慈悲的化身。

sentences.english: There is a statue of Avalokitesvara, which is the highest Bodhisattva statue in East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 有一座南海觀音像，是東海帶最高的菩薩像。

sentences.english: The Kuan Im Temple(Guan Yin.Miao) in Macau was first build over 600 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 位於澳門的觀音廟始建於600年前。

sentences.english: Together with the Avalokitesvara figure in the middle, 33 in total.
sentences.chinese: 再加上中間供奉的觀音佛身，共33身。

sentences.english: A porcelain Guanyin seated on a lotus flower over breaking waves.
sentences.chinese: 一尊瓷觀音端坐在蓮花瓣上，蓮花下是波濤紋。

sentences.english: After I went to the Museum, I discovered that Guan Yin Bodhisattva has arrived in Ukiah much earlier.
sentences.chinese: 去了才知道，觀音菩薩比我們都早到了瑜伽鎮。

sentences.english: While I have snacks, one side looking at sichuan son outfit of cloth with drinking.
sentences.chinese: 我一面喫着點心，一面看着川子裝鐵觀音的布具。

sentences.english: Is Guanyin Bodhisattva Here or Not?
The first chapter summarizes the current research on Avalokitesvara belief in china .
sentences.chinese: 本文的第一章對當前中國觀音信仰的研究作出綜述。

sentences.english: Tieguanyin tea are sweet high and lasting, is "seven bubble have notes."
sentences.chinese: 鐵觀音茶香高而持久，可謂“七泡有餘香。

sentences.english: This maybe why there is such love of Quan Yin in their lore.
sentences.chinese: 這可能是爲何在他們的傳說裏有觀音這樣的愛。

sentences.english: Always remember that here is Journey to Guanyin urged him to refrain from eating demon Ende.
sentences.chinese: 這裏八戒是時時記得觀音曾勸他不要爲妖喫人的恩德。

sentences.english: It has the largest wooden image of the Buddhist Goddess of Mercy, Guanyin.
sentences.chinese: 在其中有最大的觀音菩薩木像。

sentences.english: Nanputuo Temple is a temple dedicated to the Goddess of Mercy.
sentences.chinese: 南普陀寺是供奉觀音菩薩的寺廟。

sentences.english: Kwun Yum Shan at Kadoorie Farm, amidst the New Territories ranges.
sentences.chinese: 新界羣巒起伏，嘉道理農場的觀音山聳立其中。

sentences.english: On the hill are statues of GuanYin (a Bodhisattva) and the 800 Arhats .
sentences.chinese: 在山上有很多觀音和800個羅漢的雕像。

solemn/dignified/stately

founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
Manjushri, the Bodhisattva of keen awareness
lotus flower (Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn, among others)/water-lily
honorific title for a Buddhist monk
King Kong
diamond/(used to translate Sanskrit "vajra", a thunderbolt or mythical weapon)/guardian deity (in Buddhist iconography)
Sakyamuni Buddha (Sanskrit: sage of the Sakya)/Siddhartha Gautama (563-485 BC), the historical Buddha and founder of Buddhism
the Three Precious Treasures of Buddhism, namely: the Buddha 佛, the Dharma 法 (his teaching), and the Sangha 僧 (his monastic order)
a censer (for burning incense)/incense burner/thurible
two sides/both sides
one who has mastered the sutras (Buddhism)
temple/monastery/shrine
tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
